name: function-modifiers
description: es-function-control-flow-modifiers :: Prototypal and non-prototypal implementations of possibly desirable JavaScript/ECMAScript function/method-modifiers which allow the interception, introspection and manipulation of a function's/method's control flow in terms of its arguments, return value and context at such a modified function's/method's call/apply/execution time.
author: Peter Seliger

scripts.docufy: jest --coverage --coverageDirectory reports/test-coverage --coverageReporters html json text text-summary --config jest-stare.config.json && node_modules/.bin/jsdoc --configure jsdoc.config.json --verbose
scripts.qa: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run docufy
